document.full_text: plutonium has been found in soil at various points within japan's stricken fukushima daiichi nuclear complex but does not present a risk to human health, operator tokyo electric power co (tepco) said on monday.
document.title: japan says plutonium found at fukushima
lines_and_colors: plutonium has been found in soil at various points within japan's stricken fukushima daiichi nuclear complex but does not present a risk to human health, operator tokyo electric power co (tepco) said on monday.
